purpleculture_pinyin:
yǐn
addiction; craving
зависимость; страстное желание
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 瘾)
Pictophonetic: 隱 indicates the sound; 疒 (sickness) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 疒 [ nè ] sickness, disease
    • 隱 [ yǐn ] to hide, to conceal; secret, hidden
heisig_chinese_memo: Addictions are often not obvious or hidden well which makes them hidden sicknesses.
Ru_trainchinese: yǐn: (сущ) вредная привычка, пристрастие; страсть, сильный интерес, увлечение
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: An addiction is a kind of hidden sickness as it's hard to know if someone has one unless you get to know them.
humanum_full_description_en:
"疒", the sound of " hidden " indicates hobbies and hobbies. Qinglin Zexu "Lichen Folk Smoke Guns Appropriate to Be Confiscated Film": "So if you want to get rid of his addiction, first get rid of his gun. It's like getting a haircut and grabbing his scorpion... There is nothing for a cool addict.

" Addiction " also means internal disease. "Yu Pian‧ Furuncle": "Addiction, internal disease." "Medicine Zong Jin Jian‧ Tips for Acne Heart Techniques, Addiction Eruption": "The heart burns the lungs, rheumatism, and the cryptic rashes are spotted on the skin." Note: "Addiction People with rashes are caused by heartburn in the lungs and also caused by external rheumatism. The hair will be itchy, the color will be red, and the skin will be addicted to the skin, hence the name rash."
humanum_short_description_en: From "疒" to " hidden " sound, it means hobbies and hobbies.
humanum_full_description:
「疒」，「隱」聲，表示嗜好、癖好。清林則徐〈瀝陳民間煙土槍具似宜收繳片〉：「所以欲去其癮，先去其槍，有如理髮而奪其櫛……雖酷嗜者亦無可如何。」

　　「癮」也表示內病。《玉篇‧疒部》：「癮，內病也。」《醫宗金鑒‧痘疹心法要訣‧癮疹》：「心火灼肺風濕毒，隱隱疹點發皮膚。」注：「癮疹者，乃心火灼於肺金，又兼外受風濕而成也。發必多癢，色則紅赤，癮癮於皮膚之中，故名曰癮疹。」
humanum_short_description: 從「疒」，「隱」聲，表示嗜好、癖好。

Chinese: Addictions are often not obvious or hidden well which makes them hidden sicknesses.
Meaning: addiction
Hanzi: 瘾
Story: An addiction is a kind of hidden sickness as it's hard to know if someone has one unless you get to know them.
Kind: traditional
「 疒 」，「 隱 」聲，表示嗜好、癖好。清林則徐〈瀝陳民間煙土槍具似宜收繳片〉：「所以欲去其癮，先去其槍，有如理髮而奪其櫛……雖酷嗜者亦無可如何。」 「 癮 」也表示內病。《玉篇‧疒部》：「癮，內病也。」《醫宗金鑒‧痘疹心法要訣‧癮疹》：「心火灼肺風濕毒，隱隱疹點發皮膚。」注：「癮疹者，乃心火灼於肺金，又兼外受風濕而成也。發必多癢，色則紅赤，癮癮於皮膚之中，故名曰癮疹。」
" 疒", the sound of " hidden" indicates hobbies and hobbies. Qinglin Zexu "Lichen Folk Smoke Guns Appropriate to Be Confiscated Film": "So if you want to get rid of his addiction, first get rid of his gun. It's like getting a haircut and grabbing his scorpion... There is nothing for a cool addict. " Addiction" also means internal disease. "Yu Pian‧ Furuncle": "Addiction, internal disease." "Medicine Zong Jin Jian‧ Tips for Acne Heart Techniques, Addiction Eruption": "The heart burns the lungs, rheumatism, and the cryptic rashes are spotted on the skin." Note: "Addiction People with rashes are caused by heartburn in the lungs and also caused by external rheumatism. The hair will be itchy, the color will be red, and the skin will be addicted to the skin, hence the name rash."

yǐn
见“瘾”。

癮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐn］
［《集韻》倚謹切，上隱，影。］
“瘾1”的繁体字。
(1)见“癮疹”。
(2)嗜好；癖好。
(3)特指烟瘾发作。

【午集中】【疒字部】　癮； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页783第06
【集韻】同?。
